Chapter Previous Next

class gstPHANToMRotation : public gstPHANToMTranslation

Rigid body PHANToM dynamic class. This sets the PHANToM to control the geometry of its subgraph through rotation. Dynamic forces are sent back to PHANToM simulating a rotating mass with realistic inertial properties. Note that Mass and damping are set through the appropriate methods inherited from gstDynamic.

From header file: gstPHANToMRotation.h
